video.nodepacker



struct NodePacker;
Binary tree based texture packer. Handles allocation of texture page space.

static NodePacker opCall(Vector2u size);
Fake constructor. Returns NodePacker with specified texture size.

void die();
Destroy this NodePacker and its nodes.

bool allocate_space(Vector2u size, out Rectanglef texcoords, out Vector2u offset);
Try to allocate space for a texture with given size.

@param size Size of the texture to allocate space for. @param texcoords Texture coordinates of the texture will be output here. @param offset Offset of the texture on the page will be output here.

@return true on success. @return false on failure.

void free_space(ref Rectangleu rectangle);
Free space taken by a texture.

bool empty();
Determine if this NodePacker is empty.

string info();
Return a string containing information about this packer.
